content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Checking Cloud Email Gateway Protection server status Procedure Go to Dashboard. Click the Summary tab. Scroll down and find the Product Connection Status widget. You can check the status of any Cloud Email Gateway Protection server registered with Trend Micro Apex Central.
